Class MongoDBGlobalContextImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentStoreGlobalContext<MongoDBGlobalContext,MongoDBEntityContext>, MongoDBGlobalContext, GlobalContext<MongoDBGlobalContext,MongoDBEntityContext>

    public abstract class MongoDBGlobalContextImpl
extends BaseDocumentStoreGlobalContext<MongoDBGlobalContext,MongoDBEntityContext>
implements MongoDBGlobalContext
    Converts global MongoDB options.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto <davide@hibernate.org>, Gunnar Morling

      • writeConcern

        public MongoDBGlobalContext writeConcern(com.mongodb.WriteConcern writeConcern)
        Description copied from interface: MongoDBGlobalContext
        Specifies a custom WriteConcern implementation to be applied when performing write operations against the datastore. Either use this option or MongoDBGlobalContext.writeConcern(WriteConcernType) but not both at the same type.
        Specified by:
        writeConcern in interface MongoDBGlobalContext
        Parameters:
        writeConcern - the write concern

      • associationDocumentStorage

        public MongoDBGlobalContext associationDocumentStorage(AssociationDocumentStorageType associationDocumentStorage)
        Description copied from interface: MongoDBGlobalContext
        Specifies how association documents should be persisted. Only applies when the association storage strategy is set to AssociationStorageType.ASSOCIATION_DOCUMENT.
        Specified by:
        associationDocumentStorage in interface MongoDBGlobalContext
        Parameters:
        associationDocumentStorage - the association document type to be used when not configured on the entity or property level
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
